about_desc: Located at Andrije Marića 11, Majur, 2.8km from Šabac centre, Dvorište Hostel is a vibrant and inviting destination for workers seeking comfort and affordability. With our friendly staff, communal areas designed for socializing, and convenient location, Dvorište Hostel is the perfect base for employee accommodation.
description_one: At Dvoriste Hostel, we prioritize your comfort and convenience. We offer a range of amenities to enhance your stay and make you feel right at home. With bathrooms and kitchens available on every floor, you'll have easy access to essential facilities. Our free parking ensures a hassle-free experience for those traveling by car.
description_two: Stay connected with our complimentary Wi-Fi, available in every room, allowing you to browse the web and stay in touch with loved ones. To ensure your comfort throughout the year, every room at Dvoriste Hostel is equipped with climate control and heating, guaranteeing a pleasant and cozy atmosphere no matter the season. Relax and enjoy our exceptional amenities during your stay with us.
